entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -24.9°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except mainly cloudy in onshore winds with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy in onshore winds with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
